name: Best Com. ASHP, Env., Prcl. (EE+DF)

market_entry_year_source.notes: Assume historical penetration is captured in the baseline

energy_efficiency_source: Determined by custom savings shape information in 'tsv_features'

installed_cost_source.notes: Total installed cost for high efficiency RTHP in 2017 divided by typical output capacity (90 kBtu/h) added to costs for best commercial envelope measures using unit/cost conversions from ecm_cost_convert.json; assumes no additional costs for load shifting capabilities

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average lifetimes for high efficiency RTU in 2017

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

_description: Adjust heating/cooling set point down/up to shed peak period electricity use, pair with passive thermal energy storage and envelope/HVAC equipment efficiency generally corresponding to AEDG 50% guideline across building types; restrict to small commercial HVAC equipment that can be replaced by an ASHP (exclude chillers on the cooling side and electric boilers on the heating side, which are assumed to be installed with a chiller configuration)
_notes: Measure Definition and Status Google spreadsheet contains calculations for combining RTU and commercial envelope measures and converting units
